title: Why are energy companies forcing their way into people’s homes?
description: Energy companies have been granted warrants to forcibly switch customers on to pre-payment meters. What are the consequences for people struggling with their bills?. Help support our independent journalism at theguardian.com/infocus
episode: Why are energy companies forcing their way into people’s homes?
